title: Coffee and cardamom cake with peanut ice cream
description: Homemade peanut ice cream, coffee and cardamom cake with pistachio cream and a sprinkling of toffee popcorn dust. Who could resist this nutty recipe?Equipment and preparation: you will need a 23cm/9in deep cake tin and an ice cream maker.
ingredients: 200g/7oz butter, softened, plus extra for greasing
8 cardamom pods, seeds removed and ground
5 cardamom pods, seeds removed and ground
